text: Bil yaqeen jo mard aur jo auratein muslim hain, momin hain, mutii-e-farmaan hain, raast baaz hain, saabir hain, Allah ke aagey jhukne waley hain, sadaqa denay waley hain, roza rakhne waley hain, apni sharamgaahon ki hifazat karne waley hain, aur Allah ko kasrat se yaad karne waley hain, Allah ne unke liye magfirat aur bada ajar muhaiyya kar rakkha hai
